verbs.description: California and 16 other U.S. states [V: are] suing the Trump administration over its plans to scrap standards for how much greenhouse gases vehicles can emit .

California and 16 other U.S. states are suing the Trump administration over its plans to scrap standards for how much greenhouse gases vehicles [V: can] emit .
California and 16 other U.S. states are suing the Trump administration over its plans to scrap standards for [ARG1: how much greenhouse gases] [ARG0: vehicles] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: emit] .
